snippet.title: Sid Meier's Civilization® V Trailer
snippet.description:
We have just uploaded the brand new trailer for Sid Meiers Civilization V for Windows PC.

With over nine million units sold worldwide, and unprecedented critical acclaim from fans and press around the world, Sid Meiers Civilization® is recognized as one of the greatest strategy franchises of all-time. Now, Firaxis Games will take this incredibly fun and addictive strategy game to unprecedented heights by adding new ways to play and win; new tools to manage and expand your civilization; extensive modding capabilities; and intensely competitive multiplayer options. Civilization V will come to life in a beautifully detailed, living world that will elevate the gameplay experience to a whole new level making it a must-have for gamers around the globe!
